Siconos Installation Guide

Installing Siconos

Compile and Install of Siconos

Three steps:

  1. compile and install Siconos-Numerics
  2. compile and install Siconos-Kernel
  3. compile and install Siconos-Front-End (optional)

Warning: before that, make sure you have read the section Prerequisite.

Linux/Unix

For compilation of each package, run the following commands in Numerics/Kernel/FrontEnd directories:

 ./autogen.sh
 ./configure 
  make
  make install

Type ./configure --help to see more information.

Default installation path is /usr/local.
To change that, type 

./configure --prefix=/your/install/path

Warning: depending on the installation path, you might be root to run make install.

To run tests: 

 ./autogen.sh
 ./configure --enable-cppunit 
  make
  make install
  make check

To generate Doxygen documentation: 

make doc
